title: ExpoElite Property Selling & Renting Full Stact Website
description: I’m happy to share this ExpoElite –Property Selling and Exhibition Platform project I worked on. Our platform, enhanced by Firebase authentication and Role-Based Access Control, provide a better user experience.

title: Blood Donation Management System
description: The Blood Donation Management System is a full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) application designed to streamline and enhance blood donation activities.

title: Tech-E Event Management App
description: This project is designed to help you manage and organize tech events seamlessly and user-friendly UI.

title: Buet Employer Cricket Club
description: This website is a React-based platform designed for the cricket enthusiasts of the Buet Employer community.
